movies.title: Gotti
movies.plot: John Gotti rises to the top of the New York underworld to become the boss of the Gambino crime family. His life takes a tumultuous turn as he faces tragedy, multiple trials and a prison sentence.

events.title: John Gotti helps in the killing of James McBratney
John Gotti becomes the new head of the Gambino family
John Gotti dies of cancer in prison

movies.title: Three Christs
movies.plot: Dr. Alan Stone breaks new ground for treatment of the mentally ill through an experiment on three paranoid schizophrenic patients who believe they are Jesus Christ.
